entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers or periods of drizzle ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle or drizzle in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023
